works.name: EMCOMED
works.description: I supported the development of an ecommerce, providing code in the backend with ExpressJS and in the frontend with React. During this project, I acquired knowledge about Redis and RabbitMQ, using these technologies to store data in memory and thus provide information to the client quickly. Additionally, I implemented microservices for the different web services.

works.name: DSPOT
works.description: Here I started using TypeScript, I also strengthened my skills in design and the application of styles with CSS and Sass. I had the opportunity to participate in the development of applications with a high level of design, which has been very enriching. Additionally, I incorporated Figma as a tool for application development, which has allowed me to streamline my workflow and create more effective designs.

works.name: TETRAIMPACT
works.description: It is my current position and I am growing as a web developer, strengthening my skills and learning new techniques. I use innovative tools to improve the quality of my projects and deliver exceptional user experiences, keeping up to date with the latest industry trends.

jobs.name: camon
jobs.description: Landing page about CAMON Global Services, using Nextjs and tailwindcss. using best practices for performance, SEO, accessibility and best practices

jobs.name: f-resources
jobs.description: Page listing some of the pages with resources for development, design and documentation for the community of web developers and designers.
